properties.address: Matlock Methodist & United Reformed Church, Matlock, Derbyshire DE4 3FJ
properties.description: Based in the community rooms, accessed from Bank Road. A free warm welcome space, with access to free wifi, company and hot and cold drinks and biscuits. Alongside the team also offer Jacket Potato Lunch and Pudding at a suggested donation of £3 and £2, donation not obligatory.
properties.title: Bank Lunches, Bakes and Brews

properties.address: CDC Cosy Hub, Chesterfield, Derbyshire S40 2SW
properties.description: This is a lovely open plan living room style community Hub. We have full kitchen facilities. Refreshments provided.
properties.title: CDC Cosy Hub

properties.address: Whittington Moor Methodist Church, Chesterfield, Derbyshire S41 8NA
properties.description: We put on the community roast on the second Sunday of the month from 12pm – 2pm at Whittington Moor. The community roast is for anyone to come along to and enjoy. We’d love to see you at the next upcoming event. If you can afford it, we ask for a donation of £2.50 adults, £1.50 children.
properties.title: Chesterfield Community Roast

properties.address: Arc Leisure Matlock, Derbyshire DE4 3AZ
properties.description: It is a warm and welcoming space at the very front of the building near Reception, where hot drinks will be provided. There will always be a member of staff to welcome you to the warm space, and a table tennis table will be set-up for attendees to have a go if they choose to!
properties.title: Community Room Warm and Welcoming Space

properties.address: Central Methodist Church, Chesterfield, Derbyshire S40 1UH
properties.description: Our Warm Space will be open every Friday, beginning 3rd November 2023 until the end of March 2024, from 3.00pm - 6.00pm. We provide a warm and friendly welcome to all, with hot drinks, a warm meal, friendship, time to chat, support and signposting to other agencies to help if required. Direct access from the street. All areas, including toilets, are wheelchair accessible. Facilities for babies and young children, including baby change area. TV screen for showing films, play video games, not mainstream TV. Cornerstone Christian Bookshop and Coffee Shop is also open every day, except Wednesday, and Sunday 10:00 - 15:00.
properties.title: Cornerstone, Central Methodist Church, Chesterfield, Derbyshire S40 1UH

properties.address: West Studios, Chesterfield, Derbyshire S41 7LL
properties.description: The warm space is called Cosy Crafts and will run every Wednesday between 2 pm and 4 pm at West Studios on Sheffield Road. The project is for people of all ages and is part of the Warm Spaces network, a UK-wide initiative that aims to help people during the cost-of-living crisis. Warm spaces are free places where people can relax, have a drink, access free Wifi, meet people and join in activities. The aim is to combat loneliness and improve wellbeing while signposting people to practical help if they need it. Cosy Crafts will have a different craft activity each week that visitors can get involved in, including Indian Block Printing, Card and Gift Bag workshop, Tissue Paper Flower Making and Glass Engraving.
properties.title: Cosy Crafts

properties.address: 89 New Square, , Chesterfield. , Derbyshire S40 1PH

properties.title: Grace Chapel Chesterfield

properties.address: Greenaway Workshop, Derbyshire DE4 2PT

Our Friday Coffee and Chat sessions also provide help with accessing services
properties.title: Greenaway Wellbeing Hub

There is a pay it forward scheme so that those who are currently short of funds can get food & drink for free.

Cosy Crafts Every Wednesday from 2pm to 4pm starting 7th February West Studios, Sheffield Road What is Cosy Crafts? Cosy Crafts offers a welcoming environment where individuals can gather, enjoy complimentary refreshments, and partake in various craft activities. This initiative, in collaboration with the Warm Spaces network, aims to provide support during the cost-of-living crisis by fostering connections, combating loneliness, and improving overall well-being.
